concept.description: Minimal or no implementation has been done yet, or the repository is only intended to be a limited example, demo, or proof-of-concept.

experimental.description: Initial development is in progress, but there has not yet been a stable, usable release suitable for the public.

prototype.description: The project has reached a stable, usable state but the author(s) have ceased all work on it. A new maintainer may be desired.

stable.description: The project has reached a stable, usable state and is being actively developed.

deprecated.description: Initial development has started, but there has not yet been a stable, usable release; work has been stopped for the time being but the author(s) intend on resuming work.
